Functions

void surfit::clear_data ()
 removes all data from memory

 prints information about data memory

 executes solve procedure (gridding)
void surfit::rw_mode_set (const char *new_mode)
 set the read-write mode determines format of ROFF files (text of binary) (see datafile for details)
const char * surfit::rw_mode_get ()
 puts the read-write mode prints ROFF files format (text or binary) (see datafile for details)
